website_summaries.verdict: Sweet and lovable, this plush elephant begs to be cuddled, and makes a fantastic bedtime buddy for kids of all ages.
pros: Ultra soft and somewhat floppy, but still substantial enough for satisfying snuggles
High quality materials and excellent craftsmanship offer little ones years of enjoyment
Perfect size for little hands to grip comfortably
cons: Not everyone is a fan of those sad and soulful eyes

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Cuteness
customer_reviews.text: I already have 2 of the slightly larger elephants in this collection, and this little gray one is a perfect edition to the family! I included some pictures of what it looks like straight out of the box, with a water bottle next to it so you can get an idea of how tall it is. It is machine washable, but I would advise you to wash it on the most delicate cycle you possibly can in cold water. You wouldn't want its marble eyes to get scratched in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: Not like the first one. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a second one cause the first was so cute and I gave it away as a gift. However when the 2nd elephant came it did not have the Aurora tag on it like the first one did. The whole elephant appears poorly made and there are strings hanging off one of the arms. The ears on this one are smaller, the tail is shorter, the fur doesnt hide the seams and his eyes appear to be glued on in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: my new researcher buddy
customer_reviews.text: loved it so much. I am a Ph.D. candidate and to be honest I got a researcher buddy. she (I think) is super cute and it feels like she is alive. every one in our research lab loved her and talk to her :)))
customer_reviews.author: Naasaniin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: much bigger than i thought it would be but its very adorable i used this to top a diaper cake i am making for my sisters safari themed baby shower and it just fits so perfect and snug the quality of this plush animal is GREAT! I just love it i would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 2 Angels

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an accent for a diaper wreath made for a baby shower. It arrived fast, and is super cute and soft, but (and this is my own fault for not reading the details better) was much bigger than I was expecting and it didn't fit. Still one of the cutest elephant stuffies on Amazon though.
customer_reviews.author: FS_NYC2020

customer_reviews.title: this elephant is adorable beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this elephant is adorable beyond belief! I bought this elephant as a gift for a friend who loves stuffed animals, and she adores this little guy. His eyes are so big and cute, and even though he is mostly stuffed with soft stuffing, his limbs are weighted with polyethylene beans so he stays in the posture shown in the product picture. The fur is soft, the ears are floppy, and the baby blue coloring is lovely. As far as stuffed animals go, this one is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute For ALL Ages
customer_reviews.text: I gave this pink elephant to an 8-year-old girl at my church as a Christmas present and she squealed in excitement when she got it! She absolutely loved it! When the package first arrived in the mail, my mother and little sister (who is 22 years old by the way) were upset that I didn't purchase this cute elephant for them! It works great for ALL ages. No one is too old for a cute stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Valicity Garris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so cute ordered to top a diaper cake worked very well ( I added the pink bow :))
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly, soft, adorable, huggable, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and cuddly! I sent this to my daughter in college as a non-junk food care package. She loved it! I paid under $11 including two-day shipping with Prime. What a bargain! She sent me a picture of herself with it and it was bigger than I had expected. I sort of pictured it being slightly bigger than a small webkin or beanie baby. It is more of a cuddle size, maybe about 9" tall. To freshen it up, she can just toss it in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle - Seacoast NH

customer_reviews.title: Bought Blue and Grey, both made Great Gifts for kids
customer_reviews.text: I saw this browsing for a child's gift and I found this. It is very cute and soft and sits nicely in the position pictured. My young niece loves it and hasn't put it down since she's gotten it. Considering the price I expected it to be not quite as high quality but it was surprisingly soft and cushy. It's not the softest plush toy I've ever touched but it is very nice and makes for a great friend for young ones. It is my young niece approved and I can easily recommend this at the price.
customer_reviews.author: I Like StuffTop Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Six month old daughter won't put it down!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas, and I wasn't expecting anything much for it being under $15 to be honest. I was blown away when we opened it up by just how darn soft this thing is! My six month old daughter loves it; she holds it while she lays down for naps, she cuddles tightly to it most of the day, and we have to take it where ever we go now. That's fine with me. The eyes are not doing to pop off, they are supported through the fabric rather than glued on. My daughter won't remember her first Christmas, but I sure will thanks to this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kazoo

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cuddly - Perfect little stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my niece on her first birthday. Her mommy loves elephants and I was so excited when this little elephant was delivered to me. It's absolutely adorable and so soft and cuddly. And also perfect for little ones as there eyes are stiched so you don't have to worry about beads or choking hazards. This is so cute and they loved it!! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: K Stephens

customer_reviews.title: So cute! So soft! They are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.text: How freakin cute. He is an awesome addition to the little Phant family. Big Sis Ellie Phant, Bella Phant, and now Benny Phante. Benny brought his best friend Gerald Giraffe along with him. Benny and Gerald are so soft and cuddiley. My granddaughters love them. Update: Benny and Gerald Giraffe are loved by my granddaughter. They stay here at my house while Charlotte's mother works. They have been washed and couple times and look good as new. When Charlotte comes, the first thing she wants is Benny or Gerald!
customer_reviews.author: Trout

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My six-year-old son loves elephants and has several, but this one is his favorite. It's adorable and super soft. It's squishy enough that he can fall asleep on top of it comfortably, but it still holds its shape well. It held up fine in the washing machine and dryer when he threw up on it, and there are no stains thanks to quick treatment with Spray and Wash or Shout. It's cute and well-made and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this stuffed animal. My son LOVES his Ellie. (That’s what we call him) haha. He is incredibly soft and a great size. My son loves to chew on his trunk and his feet. He grabs his arms nuzzles his face into his body. It’s very cute. Highly recommend. To be honest I will probably order a few of these to have on reserve because he loves it that much. Can’t imagine being without it now!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeItUp

customer_reviews.title: Best stuffed animal ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest, most wonderful stuffed animal I’ve ever gotten any of my children. I bought this for my daughter this summer when she broke her leg and and “Rosie” quickly became very special to her. Excellent quality, perfect size, SO soft!
customer_reviews.author: Briean0427

customer_reviews.title: If you don't love this, there is something wrong with you
customer_reviews.text: Have to give amazon a big high five on this one. They managed to get this to me on Friday evening before christmas. My 3 yr old grand daughter has named her Trunk and keeps her upstairs so no one else will squeeze her. Also I got a little elephant book with this and made it a package gift. I am very happy with this little elephant ( My daughter , who is in her 30s' , wanted it ) So squeezable so adorable. I might just order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer AMT in Ny

customer_reviews.title: The best stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new baby girl, but her big brother (3 yrs old) has adopted it as his “baby elephant”. It’s so soft and huggable. I’d buy more stuffed animals of this brand/make for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Some snagged hairs, but super soft
customer_reviews.text: My son loves elephants. So I looked up elephant stuffed animals for him and I came across this one. For the most part I love this. So does he. The only problem I have is that a lot of the hair was yanked out. I took a picture of them and there is more not pictured. I wasn’t too happy about that so I just went and trimmed all the long pieces. But for the most part we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa S.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PRECIOUS. BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my best purchases on Amazon. Perfect color, size, and shaping. It came in the mail FAST! Reasonable price, and down right adorable!!! I definitely recommend this product. ABSOLUTELY CUTE!!! And it's soft. So soft. This product made my day (:
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reader

customer_reviews.title: Okay let me start by saying this thing is adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay let me start by saying this thing is adorable!!!! I purchased this to use as the topper for the Diaper caked for a baby shower i was throwing and it worked out perfect! on time arrival, perfect size not too small not too big & its adorable and the plush is very soft and cozy for a baby! i was very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: So Dang Cute
customer_reviews.text: I am a sixth grade teacher and bought this to use during our class meetings. The rule the kids came up with is, "If you don't have Peanut (the elephant) then you can't talk." It warms the heart to see my sixth grade boys and girls so happy to hold Peanut. They take this rule very seriously. The elephant is soft, well made and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: MollyLolly

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the baby shower
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is the best. I got it to hold a gift card for a baby shower and he turned into the hit of the shower. So soft, that the mother just kept him in her lap for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A darling sweet elephant with soulful eyes.  Super soft and plush.
customer_reviews.text: Darling! Sweet expression, super soft. Just the right size to pack in a backpack or suitcase for a trip. The perfect size for little arms to hold close for sleep. It's so hard to pick between the grey and the pink! It sits up just like pictured. A no regrets purchase as long as I don't have to give him away!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Plush and perfect
customer_reviews.text: This little one will steal your heart. Soft plush and sits perfectly with such a cute face. Adorable...adorable...adorable! Looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Donzie

customer_reviews.title: So cute and cuddly.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandma who is in a rest home. She loves elephants and gets lonely often so i thought she’d find this cuddly guy comforting when she’s sad and we can’t be there. I was very pleased with this purchase. This little guy is VERY soft and snuggly and he’s even cuter in person. My grandma loves him. My one and only complaint is that this little guy smelled a little funny upon removing his plastic bag; sort of a chemical smell. Aside from that, he was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: What a great elephant!
customer_reviews.text: It's as precious in person, as the picture looks! We bought this for our daughter, because she has a tiny elephant that she carries around, and often loses in the house. We wanted a bigger one that couldn't get lost. It's the perfect size, and so soft and cute. It is also heavier than an average stuffed animal. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This little guy was a bit bigger than I'd expected and he's so much cuter and fluffier than expected too. My daughter loves him and the baby tries fighting her for it, so cute. The baby was rough with it but it's indured everything it's been put through and still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McKeever

customer_reviews.title: THE Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter starting showing a liking to her stuffed animals a little after 1 years old. Her uncle bought her this elephant as a gift for an earlier occasion, so it had been sitting around with her other toys. It quickly became her favorite, and she loves to carry him around, sleep with him, etc. The elephant is very soft, so I can see why she likes it so much. It has had daily use for several months now, and it still looks like new. I ordered another one to keep (hopefully hidden) as a backup so she still has her elephant no matter what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Could not be any more adorable.
customer_reviews.text: JUST like the picture... soft, really flexible to maneuver around to make it animated if playing with kids (or kid like adults) I have never been a stuffed animal person.. don't dislike or like.. just not my thing.. however when I saw this it really made me go 'aaawwww' in that sing song way. I think I will order a few at this amazing price and have those baby/kid gifts at the ready!
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baby or Child Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves stuffy's - especially if they are soft. This is his new favorite stuffy that he saved up to buy. It's a good value and the fabric is soft and doesn't shed all over the place. No choking hazards on it. It's about 10" tall and decently plump/plush with filling.
customer_reviews.author: Melzie Condara Tublet

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pink. Quality stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this elephant has hands, but this was a gift to my girlfriend and she likes it very much. It's cute, soft, and pink. It's not "floppy" (like a big beanie baby, for example) but rather a little stiffer (in the feet and head), such that it can sit up like in the product description photo. Still soft enough to sleep with and should be enjoyable for anyone who likes stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl LOVES this thing! Honestly, I’m a 36 year old dude, and I personally like it too! It’s cute as hell! Those eyes get me I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Grandbaby to be
customer_reviews.text: I am in Love with this little one. I was just told I was going to be a G’ma couple weeks ago. Though still early I couldn’t resist buying this for my future grand baby. It’s so soft and cuddly. Would be a perfect gift, put on shelf, or baby to cuddle with. I like the size. Though small I think it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and super cute
customer_reviews.text: Great plush toy. I used it for a baby shower and it turned out so cute. It is super soft. Came out clean and non-smelly. Great buy. Con: Absolutely none!
customer_reviews.author: Margie DMarquez

customer_reviews.title: Product is not what I expected it to be. But my daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I'm not really happy with the one I have. The reason I bought the product is because of the toy's eyes. The one I got looks like a cross-eyed elephant. I got a little disappointed that the eyes or the elephants fur in the eye part are not proportional. It's supposed to be a one star for me or 2 star at most. I gave three star because my daughter still likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Vermelho

customer_reviews.title: Benny is the cutest
customer_reviews.text: Yes I’m a 26 year old woman who likes a cute stuffed animal on her bed ha ha. Benny is extremely soft and cuddly for anyone from an adult like myself lol to a child. I noticed he was good quality in regards to a product because after I washed and dried him he was still very soft. So definitely invest in him, he’s cute! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love the elephant, the eyes leave you wanting to hug it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew (he loves elephants) and it's adorable. The eyes are just as sad and wanting of a friend as the pictures show. I'm sure my nephew will love it, great price for an adorable addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick M. Rock III

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Soft
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture very cute and soft! I included a picture of the eyes, which seem very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought Christmas gifts for the local Sheriff's department who intend to make sure no child went without something for the holidays. A great program. When I received this one, it was so soft and really was adorable. Just loved it. I sure hope that the child that got it did too.
customer_reviews.author: Janiene

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the cutest elephant plushes you'll find
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was a huge hit. Heck, I almost bought one for myself when it arrived. It's insanely soft (sort of like a micro-fiber blanket, but better) and just downright adorable. I think the size is nice as well. The legs are moveable so you can adjust and sit him however you want, which is good for children (or adults!) who want to snuggle up with this little cutie.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Pink Ebba Elephant
customer_reviews.text: I kept this little stuffed animal hid till this year for Valentines Day for my daughter...She loves it! Its's soft and she cuddles with it at night. These stuffed animals on here have been a god sent for us...Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Willis

customer_reviews.title: Plush toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cutest plush toy ever. perfect, Just as I expected. It did not drop fuzz it was made well stitching. just the right amount of filling to be plush, yet floppy.Gave this as an easter gift to a 4month old. I believe this will be his velveteen rabbit, he was delighted. I would buy more for sure. It comes in gray and pink as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our gender reveal!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our gender reveal! It was perfect for our daughter to open on Christmas morning and let us know that the new baby will be a boy! It is super soft and my daughter loves it! Seems to be very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey587

customer_reviews.title: Irresistible
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Gosh ! What can I say about this little cutie! Lil Benny is the most darling little guy I’ve ever owned ! I normally don’t snuggle w/,small stuffed animals but this guy is irresistible! The face is oh so Sweet and he’s so so amazingly Soft ! What a great little friend to have around ! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for babyshower!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin loved this stuffed toy. Adorable and fluffy. It is soft, easy to hold. Smells as expected (doesn't smell weird). Made of good material. Highly recommended. Good for baby shower. It is of perfect size for a toddler. Good price and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Aashna Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: I had this sent to my four year old grandson since he loves elephants and he loves it. It is so cuddly and great quality. He took it to the hospital with him when he broke his arm, and the nurse's put a "cast" on him too.
customer_reviews.author: D.Mac

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this elephant for my puppy. He had a plush bear he had since he was a baby and it got destroyed by my older dog. My puppy seemed sad not to have anything to cuddle with so I got this as a replacement. He loves it and sleeps with it every night. It’s really soft and well made. It would make a great gift for a baby. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: hikergal25

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Lil Benny Elephant is so soft, made well with durable material and is something that I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a cute little stuffed elephant. I decided to purchase the other two to complete the set. Just adorable.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Stuffie!
customer_reviews.text: My brother has a large collection of elephants and this was the perfect addition! It’s so soft and very high quality for the price. I would definitely suggest this as a gift for children or any elephant lover.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess Abrozanthe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, great value , Great overall product
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest elephant I've ever seen. And it is so soft I think I could sleep with it. I gave it to my six-year-old granddaughter and she is already in love with it and his calling him Benji
customer_reviews.author: barbara munro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hospital Donation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this among other toys as a donation for LA Children’s Hospital is memory of our nephew. My sister-in-law commented on how cute all the items were and how proud she was to donate them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: The cutest stuffed animal!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuffed elephant is SO cute! I fell in love with it as soon as I saw it on Amazon! I had to buy this for my first grandchild! It is soft, cozy and I think he will be loved! He is a bit bigger than I thought he would be but not too big. How can you say no to those eyes!? He is too cute not to buy him! I am very happy with this stuffed animal!
customer_reviews.author: SForsberg

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the cutest, softest pink elephant. Her ears are nice and floppy. She sits up nicely and so adorable. Her eyes are nicely attached plastic that I don't think would come off. So nice for kiddos. I just may keep her myself and order another one for the baby gift she was planned for.
customer_reviews.author: Paula McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect new baby gift 🎁.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and just the right size for a baby’s hands. I paired it with a sleeping gown with elephant 🐘 print. I also included a book with an elephant 🐘 on the cover. It made a nice shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Hall

customer_reviews.title: It's so squishy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! It was a gift for a child and they absolutely loved it! It is very soft and squishy and loveable...highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little elephant!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sweetest, softest little stuffed animal I have seen in a long time. SO PERFECT for our newest family addition. It looks like the picture and is a little smaller than I first expected, but it will be an adorable addition to our Great Grand daughter's bed. And I just bet this will probably be her favorite toy soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This might sound ridiculous, but the reason for the low rating is because of the eyes—in the advertised picture, the eyes sort of look like precious moment eyes looking directly at you, but the one I received has the eyes looking way off to the side! It legit looks like a lazy eye or something. Will be returning, which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Sooo adorable and it took me forever to find a blue elephant. I was just really disappointed because I really thought this elephant was going to be oh so soft but it actually feels a little stiff. Great for decoration or elephant lovers not cuddly enough though.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and just adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most adorable stuffed animal ever! It is very soft and well made. I added this to a baby shower gift basket for my friend from work and she absolutely loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: KK Downing

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cute elephant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Extremely soft. Perfect size. I love that it has little beans (like a beanie baby) in the feet which give it weight and help it sit up.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJean

customer_reviews.title: Love elephants.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't resist buying this elephant for my new granddaughter and was not disappointed! The elephant is a wonderful size, is beautifully soft, and is just as adorable as the pictures suggest.
customer_reviews.author: christa

customer_reviews.title: Cutest and Most Soft Elephant Around...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gift and a great thing to keep around the house. My daughter loves this and keeps it close to her as she says it is the most soft and cute stuffy she has ever been given. I would recommend this to anyone who needs a soft and reliable stuffy that will always be there to cuddle. The smaller size does not take away form it because it is just such a cute item. This is perfect for children of all ages that just want another cuddle buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Degen

customer_reviews.title: Our two year old boy loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We got this adorable fuzzy guy for our two year old son who was about to have minor surgery. We knew it was going to be a tough day, and wanted to get something special to help him be comfortable after. It’s been a few days since it arrived, but our kid is absolutely in love with this. It’s soft but firm enough for him to lay on to provide him support. The quality looks like it’ll hold up very well, and it’s very soft. Could not ask for more. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Tollefsrud

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought this elephant to use as a topper for a diaper cake she made, needless to say she loved him. He is soft and definitely adorable. The person receiving the gift loved him as well, we do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my niece's new baby due the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece's new baby due the end of June. As soon as you open the box you get a waft of some kind of chemical . It couldn't be covered up with anything. It is a cute stuffed animal though
customer_reviews.author: TracySue

customer_reviews.title: Hope those eyes stay on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter who is 2. I'm hoping the reviewers who say it's ok for a child that young are correct - I worry a little about the eyes but the write up says they are attached from within and not just glued on. But it's really cute and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very cuddly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I love it myself -I almost wanted to keep it. Cuddly soft. It is as advertised. I searched high and low for something like this - in sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: ricochet rabbit 212

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loved it! It's so adorable and super soft. It's not your average stuffed animal, it's unique, but that's what I love about it. Would absolutely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuffed animal. I got it for my daughter for her stocking but it was a tad too big. But it is amazing quality. Super soft. And great for gifting for a nine month old.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It's huggable
customer_reviews.text: My niece really loves her Lil Benny Phant and takes it with her everywhere she goes. She even sleeps with it. She said it's very huggable and keeps her company.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Reyna

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE SOFTEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item twice, for two babies gifts. let me tell you, it was so hard giving it up both times. It was the perfect size for the babies, and so soft and plush. It will make a favorite stuffed animal for any little person!
customer_reviews.author: Pieni Ruusu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super soft fur but not soft and squishy overall. A little stiff. Not ideal. But good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Z.

customer_reviews.title: 😍❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT I can’t wait til my son is born he will love it it’s so fluffy, soft, and so very cute and our so adorable it’s the perfect size for him and the theme is elephants this would have been perfect on top of the diaper cake I should’ve ordered and looked soon ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Most Adorable Little Elephant
customer_reviews.text: There is no cuter stuffed elephant on the market. Both me and my wife fell in love with this little face and were very happy to gift it to an important little girl in our lives. Build quality is great, soft and snuggly, and it's even more adorable "in person". Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: So adorable that I almost didn't want to give it to the charity I bought it for! He is super soft and has a sad, please hug me look to him. Love him!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy was the cutest, softest, lovable, huggable, and snuggly stuffed animal I’ve ever had the pleasure of gifting to someone. Highly HIGHLY recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Trasatti

customer_reviews.title: Cute plush.
customer_reviews.text: My friend loved it. They did their babies room in elephants. So, this went really well with the rest of the baby gift set I got them for their baby shower. It has beans in the four feet and butt. Is plush and sits up-right and the top legs move.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for children or young at heart.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft and cuddly. The beans or whatever weights the seat keeps it in one spot and erect if on a firm bed or chair or on a shelf . A nice gift for children or those young at heart. ( I did not give to an infant or toddler, for such young ages you may want to satisfy yourself about safety.)
customer_reviews.author: Pisces

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.. Nice buy..
customer_reviews.text: Good one.. nice soft toy.. "Amazon is removing or not allowing me to write the review"
customer_reviews.author: Yash Sawant

customer_reviews.title: If you plan to gift this to someone, buy 2 so you can keep 1 for yourself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cute fella for a friend's daughter, but when my husband saw it, he insisted we needed to keep it for ourselves. So I ordered a 2nd one to give to the friend's daughter, but then my husband said they were twins and couldn't be separated. Long story short - we now have 2 of these adorable elephants, and the child has none.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mcquillan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gift !
customer_reviews.text: This lil plushie is ADORABLE! It was a Valentine’s Day gift for my gal friend. We are both grad students so I wondered how she’d feel about getting a stuffed animal but she instantly fell in love with it ! More than the card and chocolates and spa gifts, THIS ridiculously adorable softie is her favorite ! It’s very soft while still having enough body to sit up on its own and keep its shape. So so cute! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Riley McDiffitt

customer_reviews.title: Beads in it. Not safe for my young son
customer_reviews.text: Was rated best first doll for child to sleep with. Don’t get how that is possible. Great doll but it has beads in the area of the butt on the elephant. don’t know how that is safe for my 15 month old son if it ripped
customer_reviews.author: lance r

customer_reviews.title: Passed the kid test!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was similar to one my grandson had at his house. If he would spend the night here he missed his elephant. Saw this and when it was delivered it far exceeded my expectations. Quality product. Soft and squishy. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharps

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift from my son to his girlfriend. He was amazed by the quality of this stuffed animal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter because she say all of the wonderful reviews and she really wanted it. She has about 500 other stuffed animals but, she never liked any of them as much as she loves this one. It is very cute and super soft. She is 12 and I'm pretty sure that this little gray elephant would bring anyone of any age lots of joy. I give Amazon two thumbs up for this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: I desperately want Ellie for myself but you can’t steal an adorable elephant from a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: This elephant is just the cutest thing ever. We got this as a birthday present for my daughter and she just loves her “Ellie” (she renamed Lil Benny Phant which was the original name on the tag). I desperately want Ellie for myself but you can’t steal an adorable elephant from a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Plushy baby
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters 17 birthday. She had just gotten a elephant tattoo and it came in handy. Its good size. The price is great and it arrived quickly. Its super soft and so more cute in person. Very huggable.
customer_reviews.author: J.B

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This buddy is super soft! Its cute and the eyes are patches instead of buttons or other chocking hazards.
customer_reviews.author: Denied-Lobotomy

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size and very cute looking
customer_reviews.text: Very cute stuffed animal. Got this for my daughter. She has one stuffed animal that she loves but will occasionally place with other ones. It's a nice size and very cute looking. Great for a baby present or toddler (even a teen or adult that likes elephants). It does have the little beads in it (bottom and ends of all the feet).
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! The size is just right for me because bigger than that and it will kinda lose its cuteness points. Soft and good quality too. It’s about the size of a bottled water and the marble eyes are its highlight. Exactly as the photo!
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute item I bought it for my son for his Easter Basket he’s going to love it!! It’s very soft and perfect size to sleep with. I would recommend this item especially for the price it makes a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffyy227

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Just for reference...im 25 and I love this stuffed animal!! Great to cuddle with. Super cute. Makes me smile everytime I see her!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness so soft, pretty, and so sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness soooo soft so sweet so cute. It arrived quickly. All the adult children were hugging it because it was so soft to hold. I had to force them to give it back to the grand babies.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Precious!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son "got this for me" for Mother's Day (he picked it out and put it in my cart and had me order it and pay for it - LOL). It is soooo soft and cuddly - absolutely adorable - awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: boomersgang

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is ADORABLE. I'm so picky but this was a perfect online buy. Don't even think twice. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: Got this to include in the gifts for my adopted senior for Christmas. It is so soft and absolutely adorable. Didn't see anything better in local stores, especially not for this price. I hope this little guy brings joy to the senior who receives it.
customer_reviews.author: rainy day jayne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for making these available at a reasonable price. 2 times a year I go to a charity called Stuff a Bag where they fill back packs with things for children. All bags must have a stuffed animal and a blanket. These guys are the perfect size and they are so cuddly I know some little person will have something to love. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snuggly
customer_reviews.text: Mommy loved this for her little boy. I gifted it with a book where elephants are the central characters.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gitaitis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an adorable plush elephant. Good quality and dirá well. A bit heavier than I expected but turned out great for the baby room.
customer_reviews.author: Yunia Valenzuela

product_meta.title: ebba - Lil Benny Phant - 10" Lil Benny Phant - Grey
product_meta.description: Style:Lil Benny Phant Grey| Color:Grey| Size:10-InchesLook at those big inviting eyes Lil Benny Phant is 10 inches of grey goodness with silky, floppy ears and a squeezable trunk. Soft and round, hes a cuddle bug.
feature_bullets: Endearing facial expression and body position
